failure.message:
AssertionError: Missing simulation loader component token 'sourceComponent: SimulationRoot {' in main.qml assert 'sourceComponent: SimulationRoot {' in 'pragma ComponentBehavior: Bound

import QtQuick 6.10
import QtQuick3D 6.10
import PneumoStabSim 1.0 as PSS
impor...root.contextTelemetryBridge

 }
 }
'

 }
